newsitem.title: USA: Telex Communications hires firm, considers IPO.
newsitem.headline: Telex Communications hires firm, considers IPO.

text.p: Telex Communications Group Inc said on Wednesday that it hired an investment banking firm to evaluate strategic alternatives to maximize shareholder value, including the possibility of an initial public offering.
Telex said it hired Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette to assist in the evaluation. It said the alternatives include but are not limited to an initial public offering.
For the 12 months ended September 30, the company said it had revenues of $158.2 million and earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization of $37.1 million.
